channel.title: How to make the person stay in the same spot when ranging
channel.description: i need to know how to make your character stay in the same spot while ranging, ex: im in the wilderness, i have a dark bow equipped. i click on the person i want to attack, they are 20 squares away. my character runs right next to them and attacks. i want to stop this please :D it would make my server tons better

item.title: How to make the person stay in the same spot when ranging
item.dc:creator: @darkmage8592 darkmage8592
item.description:
@darkmage8592 wrote:

yes, feel free to prove anyone wrong as long as you can tell me

Read full topic
item.source: How to make the person stay in the same spot when ranging

item.title: How to make the person stay in the same spot when ranging
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote=“Rs Classic”][quote author=tonypker13 link=topic=301834.msg2421945#msg2421945 date=1220390481]
Thats your source, i dont think its possible to do this unless your like the best coder there is
[/quote]

Lol, actually you don’t have to be the best coder there is it is simple.[/quote]

Its simple to make a person stay in the same spot while ranging? Feel free to prove me wrong.
